EmailTemplate.name: 201802_EMEAI_HAPP_HELO_Email_JC.201802_EMEAI_HAPP_HELO_Email1_JC
EmailTemplate.subject: Save Money On Your Maintenance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Did you know that if your fleet has Honeywell avionics on board, you could fix your annual avionics maintenance costs by signing up for Honeywell's Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP)? What's more, with flexible payments terms, your budgeting process will never have been easier! Should the unexpected happen you can count on HAPP to ensure that your rotorcraft is flight-ready and back in the air-fast! With quick service and unparalleled 24/7 support from Honeywell's technical product experts, there is nowhere you can fly that we don't have you covered.
LEARN MOREÂ <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/helohapp]]>
